title: Sepsis a leading cause of death in US hospitals but many deaths may not be preventable

title_detail.value: Sepsis a leading cause of death in US hospitals but many deaths may not be preventable

summary: A research team has comprehensively reviewed the characteristics and clinical management of patients who died with sepsis.
